jobQuery.value:
WITH Records AS
(
    SELECT  
            arrayElement.ArrayValue.properties as properties,
            arrayElement.ArrayValue.operationName as operationName,
            arrayElement.ArrayValue.category as eventCategory,
            arrayElement.ArrayValue.tenantId as tenantId,
            arrayElement.ArrayValue.time as time
    FROM [EventHub] AS eh 
    CROSS APPLY GetArrayElements(eh.records) AS arrayElement
),
Events AS
(
    SELECT 
            operationName,
            eventCategory,
            tenantId,
            time,
            properties.result as result,
            properties.category as operationCategory,
            properties.initiatedBy.[user].userPrincipalName as initiatedBy,
            GetArrayElement(properties.targetResources, 0) as targetResource
    FROM [Records]
    WHERE eventCategory = 'AuditLogs'
),
Items AS
(
    SELECT 
            operationName,
            eventCategory,
            tenantId,
            time,
            result,
            operationCategory,
            initiatedBy,
            targetResource.userPrincipalName as userPrincipalName,
            targetResource.displayName as groupName,
            targetResource.type as type,
            GetArrayElement(targetResource.modifiedProperties, 1) as groupItem
    FROM [Events]
)
SELECT
    operationName,
    operationCategory,
    eventCategory,
    result,
    tenantId,
    initiatedBy,
    userPrincipalName,
    CASE  
        WHEN OperationName = 'Add member to group' OR 
             OperationName = 'Remove member from group'  THEN REPLACE(groupItem.newValue, '"', '')
        ELSE groupName   
    END AS groupName,
    type,
    time
INTO [ServiceBus]
FROM [Items]
WHERE
    operationCategory = 'UserManagement' OR
    operationCategory = 'GroupManagement'
